name: 安东尼奥·穆奇
bio_short: 意大利裔美国发明家。他被广泛认为是“电话”的最早发明者（`meucci_telettrofono_1857`），但因贫困而未能延续其专利告诫书，最终在与贝尔的专利战中败诉。
bio_short_en: An Italian-American inventor. He is widely recognized as the *first* inventor of the telephone (`meucci_telettrofono_1857`), but lost the patent rights to Bell after being too poor to renew his patent caveat.
